summary.span: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.

span.span: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否可以安裝指定的組件。The method determines whether the specified assembly can be installed. 若要避免擲回例外狀況，該檔案必須符合下列準則：To avoid an exception being thrown, the file must meet the following criteria: - 檔案存在。The file exists. - .NET Framework 組件檔案。The file is a .NET Framework assembly. - 公用類型都可以讀取檔案。The public types can be read from the file. - 沒有至少一個公用、 非抽象類別，其可擴充類別，並包含屬性。There is at least one public, non abstract class that extends the class and contains the attribute. - 可以建立的每個安裝程式執行個體。An instance of each installer can be created. > [!NOTE] > 如果組件有效，但包含任何安裝程式，則會擲回例外狀況。If the assembly is valid but contains no installers, an exception is thrown. 此行為與不同，在安裝階段，當它不是空的組件安裝錯誤。This behavior differs from that at install time, when it is not an error to install an empty assembly. ## Examples 在下列範例中，方法套用至這兩個存在並不存在的組件，且呼叫的結果會顯示到主控台。In the following example, the method is applied to both an existent and nonexistent assembly and the results of the call are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CPP/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/CS/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_CheckIfInstallable/VB/assemblyinstaller_checkifinstallable.vb#1)]

exception.span: The specified assembly cannot be installed.

span.span: The specified assembly cannot be installed.

summary.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 復原會將電腦還原到安裝發生之前的狀態。A rollback restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation occurred. 會呼叫方法方法，這個執行個體，或安裝程式中的任何安裝程式集合無法正確執行。The method is called if the method of this instance or of any installer in the installer collection fails to run correctly. 藉由呼叫所產生的任何例外狀況方法的集合中的安裝程式會被忽略，並繼續執行其他的安裝程式復原。Any exceptions generated by calling the method of an installer in the collection are ignored, and the rollback of the other installers continues. ## Examples 在下列範例中，呼叫方法來復原安裝程序上指定的組件。In the following sample, the method is called to undo the install process on the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CPP/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/CS/assemblyinstaller_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_Rollback/VB/assemblyinstaller_rollback.vb#1)]

Removes an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來移除先前已完成的安裝。Call this method to remove a previously completed installation. 如果方法的其中一個集合中的安裝程式將會失敗，則仍會針對其餘的安裝程式呼叫。If the method fails for one of the installers in the collection, it is still called for the remaining installers. 解除安裝失敗不會回復在電腦為其解除安裝前狀態。A failed uninstallation does not roll back the computer to its pre-uninstallation state. > [!NOTE] > 雖然並方法之後安裝，儲存電腦狀態檔案包含從`savedState`參數可能已刪除在某個時間點安裝完成之後。Although the and methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete. 刪除檔案時，如果`savedState`參數是`null`。If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`. ## Examples 在下列範例中，安裝之後，會呼叫方法，並認可組件做為參數傳遞至建構函式。In the following sample, the method is called after installing and committing the assembly passed as the parameter to the constructor. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`建立新檔案命名為"{組件名稱}。InstallLog"來記錄訊息，這個組件。Setting this property to `true` creates a new file named "{Assembly name}.InstallLog" to log messages for this assembly. 設定至`false`防止建立新的檔案。Setting to `false` prevents the new file from being created. ## Examples 在下列範例中，由叫用建構函式。In the following example, an is created by invoking the constructor. 這個物件的屬性設定為`true`並上叫用方法`MyAssembly_HelpText.exe`組件。The property of this object is set to `true` and the method is invoked on the `MyAssembly_HelpText.exe` assembly. 由於這個原因，記錄訊息會顯示在主控台上。Due to this, the log messages are displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CPP/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/CS/assemblyinstaller_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyInstaller_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyInstaller_HelpText/VB/assemblyinstaller_helptext.vb#1)]
